[CDF-25748] Support search configuration dump (#2003)

# Description

Recently we added support for a new resource type `search configuration`
for configuring the search application for a particular view. This adds
support to dump the already existing `search configuration`.

<img width="733" height="78" alt="Screenshot 2025-09-23 at 3 06 18â€¯PM"
src="https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b0f5cbda-1868-4b6d-ac7e-6a4d9c08bffd"
/>

## Changelog

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Skip

## cdf

### Added

- [alpha] Support dumping search configurations, `cdf dump
search-config`.

## templates

No changes.
